alert.note: Alert for Gordon; Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 10:25AM EST until February 05 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Conasauga River near Tilton affecting Whitfield, Gordon and Murray Counties. For the Conasauga River Basin...including Eton, Crandall, Dalton, Keiths Mill near Dalton, Chatsworth, Tilton, Sloan Bridge near Dalton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Conasauga River near Tilton. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands...fields and pastures along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on the Brackett Ridge Road bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 18 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
